blogPage.titleStories: Stories of Hope: Nourishing Minds, Changing Lives
blogPage.sub-textStories: Explore inspiring stories of hope, transformation, and the power of giving. Our journey takes us through the lives of individuals who inspire change, and together, we can make a difference. Join us in our mission to nourish minds, change lives, and support those in need. Your contribution can help us turn these stories into real-world impact.
blogPage.sub-textBlogs: Exploring our collection of insightful articles is the key to understanding the problem, which is half the solution. Our blogs take you through perspectives and ideas illuminating critical issues. Join us as we delve into pressing matters, share knowledge, and rally for a better world. Your engagement, through reading, can turn words into meaningful impact.

blog.subMoreArticles: The world needs to fight with the hunger. Let’s learn more
blog.subMoreStories: More Stories, More Impact: Dive into Compelling Narratives of Hope

HeroSection.mission: We are on a mission to combat hunger
HeroSection.text: Please support our cause with a small donation today! People are dying from hanger and every dollar counts and brings us closer to our fundraising goal. Thank you for your generosity!.

donation.title: Change- Become a Donor
donation.subtitle: At BUY ME A MEAL website,your generosity has the power to change lives. Here is how you can contribute:
donation.step1text: With just a few clicks, you can acquire special donation coupons through our user-friendly platform. These coupons serve as the catalyst for nourishing those who hunger for a meal.
donation.step2text: Your contributions directly translate into meals for those in need. Your support helps us create a tangible and positive difference in the community
donation.step3text: By becoming a donor, you join a community of like-minded individuals committed to making the world a better place, one meal at a time

ourGoals.title: Our Goals
ourGoals.goal1text: We aim to reduce poverty by ensuring that individuals and families in need have access to nutritious meals, regardless of their financial circumstances. Through your generous contributions, we strive to improve the lives of those facing economic hardship.
ourGoals.goal2text: Our mission is to eliminate hunger by providing regular access to wholesome and nourishing meals for those who are food-insecure. We encourage community participation and volunteering to create a lasting impact on food accessibility
ourGoals.goal3text: At Buy Me a Meal, we are on a mission to provide nutrition to prevent bad health and combat diseases caused by malnutrition

restaurant.title: Join Us - Restaurants can make a Difference
restaurant.subtitle: As a restaurant owner or manager, you play a vital role in our mission. We are reaching out to you with an exciting opportunity to not only make a positive impact on your community but also promote your restaurant to a wider audience. Here is how you can participate:
restaurant.step1text: By joining our cause, you can easily showcase your restaurant and its delectable dishes on our website. We will create a dedicated page for your restaurant, complete with mouthwatering images and descriptions of your meals.
restaurant.step2text: Donors who want to support our mission can purchase meals from your restaurant. These meals can be redeemed by those in need, ensuring that you reach a broader customer base.
restaurant.step3text: We provide you with a secure and user-friendly dashboard that allows you to verify and track coupon redemptions. You will have full control over the process and can monitor the impact your contributions are making.
restaurant.step4text: Once a meal is provided to a person in need, you can easily mark it as used in your control panel. This ensures that the meals purchased by donors have been distributed, maintaining the integrity of the program.

joinus.title: Working Together to End Hunger
joinus.text: Your small act of kindness can make a big difference. Together, we can change lives and create a brighter future. Donate today and be the change you wish to see in the world.

blogs.title: Blogs
blogs.subtitle: Explore here articles about hunger and poverty in our world

aboutus.p1: This website serves as the Capstone Project for the Frontend Web Development in Re:coded. It is dedicated to showcasing our ability to create websites in accordance with specified requirements and even infuse creativity into the process. Leveraging our technical skills, including GitHub, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Firebase and Next.js, we successfully executed this project. Moreover, we employed our soft skills to facilitate effective communication, making this experience highly valuable and the timely delivery of the project.
aboutus.p2: Our vision was to create a donation website that is easy to navigate and understand its purpose. Firstly, donors can explore relevant blogs on the Blogs page. To discover restaurants and their meals, they can visit the Meals page and add items to their cart for donation. When ready to make a donation, donors can proceed to the checkout page by clicking the cart icon, entering their name, and providing credit card. The process is designed to be swift, without requiring sign-ups that might elongate the experience.
aboutus.p3: On the other hand, restaurants are required to sign up to add their meals to our database via the dashboard. Through the dashboard, they can access an overview of donation history, visualize the number of donations per month or year, and update their profile information (name, image, password, email, etc.) through the settings.
aboutus.p resp: We have ensured full responsiveness across various screen types and sizes by utilizing Tailwind CSS for this website.
aboutus.p fir: We built our backend using Firebase and organized it into three blocks: a donors collection, a restaurants collection, and a meals collection.
aboutus.p creat: We enriched our database by working with meals instead of coupons ; and we used Stripe for real time paiment.
